.. _sec:theory:

Basic Theory
============

A first discovery was that 1+1 is 2.

.. --- begin exercise ---

Exercise 1: My problem
----------------------

Here is an important equation:

.. _Eq:my:prob:eq1:

.. math::

    \tag{1}
    2+2 = 4
        
        

As shown in :ref:`(1) <Eq:my:prob:eq1>`, 2 and 2 is 4.

.. --- end exercise ---
